value:
$WmMPID_開花セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Bloom01,Face|The strength to protect others,
wielded with love—that is how
you save the world.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|You are a descendant from Embla's
line, then. You have been granted
the power of her blood.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Granted? Hm. Yes, my ancestors
must have asked her to bestow her
power on them.$k$pI, however, have only ever found
this power to be a curse—one that
I never asked for.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|I see... Of course. I understand you
must carry a tremendous burden.$k$pThough I have heard your ancestor
Thrasir was blessed with wisdom,
strength, and kindness all.$k$pWould you be so kind as to remove
your mask so I might look upon your
true face?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|I see...no reason why not, but
may I ask what it is you believe
you will see looking at my face?$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Just as I hope to learn more about
the people of Askr, so too do I hope
to understand those of Embla.$k$pI would not ask you to do so against
your will, but...I would appreciate it.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...All right. I no longer have any
cause to hide my identity.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|Will this do?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Zacharias! It's been so long since
we've seen you without a mask on!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Pain|I have always been the same
person, even masked...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|True—but it's different now. It feels
like a reunion...like a return to the old
days of the Order of Heroes.$k$pNow the Order has both you and
$Nu with us...$k$pI feel ready for anything that may
come our way.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|The Order is finally back together.
Nothing can stop us!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Smile|It does feel that way. If only matters
were so simple.$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Zacharias. Your mask
off, I can see it. Your resemblance
to your ancestor is strong.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I am glad to have this chance
to meet you all.$k$p$Sbs150|
